name: Temple of the Monolith
description:
Temple of the Monolith is a fast-paced hack-and-slash game where you get to explore an ancient underground temple.

Core features:
• Low time to kill - no bullet sponges!
• Combo your abilities to maximize their effectiveness.
• Player skill matters - evade enemies attacks.
• Hand-crafted experience. The temple is hand-made piece-by-piece.

Made with passion and love!
-Inkeri
